text: Jhonder Leonel Cádiz Fernández (born 29 July 1995) is a Venezuelan professional footballer who plays as a striker for Nashville SC on loan from Portuguese club Benfica, and the Venezuela national team. ==Club career== A product of Deportivo Petare's youth system, Cádiz made his professional debut in Deportivo Petare's 0–0 Primera División draw against Atlético El Vigía on 29 March 2012. He spent two seasons playing for Caracas FC. Cádiz was loaned to Portuguese club C.F. União on 3 July 2015. A year later, he moved to fellow Madeira club C.D. Nacional, signing a three-year deal. On 28 June 2019, Portuguese champions Benfica announced that Cádiz had signed a five-year contract with the club. He was then loaned out to Dijon for one season. On 9 September, Cádiz joined MLS side Nashville SC on loan until 30 June 2021.https://www.nashvillesc.com/post/2020/09/08/nashville-sc-acquires- venezuelan-international-jhonder-c-diz-loan-designated-player ==International career== On 23 May 2013, Cádiz was called up to the senior Venezuela national football team for a friendly match against El Salvador, but he did not play. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="2"|União da Madeira |- |2015–16||23||2||2||2||2||0||0||0||27||4 |- |rowspan="2"|Nacional |- |2016–17||11||1||0||0||0||0||0||0||11||1 |- |rowspan="2"|Moreirense |- |2017–18||17||2||1||0||0||0||0||0||18||2 |- ! colspan="2"|Career totals !46!!4!!3!!2!!2!!0!!0!!0!!51!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Caracas Category:Venezuelan footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Venezuela international footballers Category:Venezuela under-20 international footballers Category:Venezuelan Primera División players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Major League Soccer players Category:Deportivo Petare players Category:Caracas FC players Category:C.F.
